Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.constraints

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdjacentRoom
    this class checks if the player shoot at a room
    AdjacentRoomTest
    test class of AdjacentRoom
    Constraint
    father method of all constraints
    MinimumDistance
    this class check the distance between the Owner and the Target or between the Target and the previous target
    MinimumDistanceTest
    test class of MinimumDistance
    SameDirection
    this class check if the enemies are on the same direction with the Owner
    SameDirectionTest
    test class of SameDirection
    SamePlayer
    this class check if the targeted enemy are the same player of the previous effect
    SamePlayerTest
    test class of SamePlayer
    SameSquare
    this class check if the targeted square is the same square of another square
    SameSquareTest
    test class of SamePlayer
    See
    this class check if the Owner can see the target
    SeeTest
    test class of See
